articles.title: WhatsApp is preparing to roll out third-party chat support - TechCrunch
articles.description: With a month away from the Digital Markets Act (DMA) deadline, WhatsApp is preparing to allow other messaging networks in its app.
articles.content:

articles.title: Apple wins Apple Watch antitrust lawsuit with AliveCor - The Siasat Daily
articles.description: San Francisco: Apple has won its ongoing legal battle with the US-based medical device company AliveCor over the Apple Watch's heart monitoring technology. AliveCor had accused Apple of limiting third-party access to specific heart rate data collected by the …

articles.title: Radio Maps May Reveal the Universe’s Biggest Magnetic Fields - Quanta Magazine
articles.description: A controversial technique has produced detailed maps of the magnetic fields in colossal galaxy clusters. If confirmed, the approach could be used to reveal where cosmic magnetic fields come from.
articles.content:
By making maps of the magnetic fields hidden inside massive galaxy clusters, astronomers are getting closer to finding the origin of cosmic magnetism.
These are the first maps of the detailed struct… [+7128 chars]
